snippet: The Nets were well on their way to their worst loss of the season, and a late rally made it only slightly more palatable as they fell to the Milwaukee Bucks at Barclays Center.
abstract: Milwaukee Bucks beat Brooklyn Nets, 97-88, in NBA action.
lead_paragraph: The Nets were well on their way to their worst loss of the season, and a late rally made it only slightly more palatable as they fell to the Milwaukee Bucks at Barclays Center.

headline.seo: Bucks Send Nets to Fourth Straight Loss
headline.main: For Nets, Any Adjective Suits if It Means ‘Bad’
headline.print_headline: For Nets, Almost Any Adjective Fits if It Means ‘Bad’
